CustomField.description:
Total count of all status and inquiry cases opened in the past 30 days . This count is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Count_of_Issues_Last_30_Days__c
Criteria for status and inquiry cases is record type = 02. Customer Inquiry and reason is not status/inquiry
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Count of all status and inquiry cases for all related accounts opened in the past 30 days.
CustomField.label: Status and Inquiry Last 30 Days
